branchCategory.name: VV061
branchCategory.description: The VV061 series is a direct operated 3-way solenoid valve designed for 4 and 8 station units with integrated compact manifold, valve, circuit board, base and fittings forming a single compact unit.&nbsp; VV061 series model has an optional&nbsp;power saving circuit that can be used for long-term continuous duty.&nbsp; This unit is available with one-touch or barb fitting and an optional connector cable with lengths of 300, 600, or 1000mm.

branchItem.name: VV061, 3 Port, Direct Operated , Compact Solenoid Valve
branchItem.description: The VV061 series is a direct operated 3-way solenoid valve designed for 4 and 8 station units with integrated compact manifold, valve, circuit board, base and fittings forming a single compact unit.&nbsp; VV061 series model has an optional&nbsp;power saving circuit that can be used for long-term continuous duty.&nbsp; This unit is available with one-touch or barb fitting and an optional connector cable with lengths of 300, 600, or 1000mm.
